channel.title: ThePeachTimes
channel.description: TPT is a small news website about tech, cats, and computers

item.title: what is tracery
item.description:
Tracery is a library that can generate sentances and other things. It reads
from a JSON file with a sentance structure inside it, then it can generate
anything you want! here are some intresting things generated with it:

 i like to eat pepper jack cheese because it is thoughtless
 my name is Landon and my favorite distribution i

item.title: happy new year
item.description:
its now 2020! also this article is a few days late sorry lol

Anyways, TPT is now 2 years old and has moved 3 times! We have many articles planned for 2020 (dont cheat and look in .drafts lol, anyways i just added it to the gitignore so now you cant) and i got a bit more hardware to make articles about too.

dont worry - the next real article is coming soon!

item.title: tpt is now on github
item.description:
With google getting rid of a lot of their services, we decided to move away from Blogger, a blogging website owned by google, because it seems like google is neglecting it.
We are now using GitHub Pages, which has static pages, using a blogging script
